extension.summary: "A Confluence ZEITGEIST" is a clean and modern rework of the Confluence skin.
extension.description: "A Confluence ZEITGEIST" is a clean and modern rework of the Confluence skin. It mainly features an icon-based main menu without the need for scrolling and two all new wall views, which replace the old thumbnail view. Countless other small graphics updates and optimizations are included.
